content.raw: Ok, so the problem is definitely introduced by this pull request. I think it's because the tests have been changed to use `ogre2` instead of `ogre`. I'm not finding a build of the `ign-gazebo2` branch which ran the rendering integration tests, so I triggered a new one to see if they run this time: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1870)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1870/)
content.html: Ok, so the problem is definitely introduced by this pull request. I think it's because the tests have been changed to use ogre2 instead of ogre. I'm not finding a build of the ign-gazebo2 branch which ran the rendering integration tests, so I triggered a new one to see if they run this time:
